title: Initial Access
description: Enter the 4-digit code on the screen. The order of the digits does not matter.

title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and the system doesn't respond), repeatedly press the screen or buttons until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This will reset the input.

title: Reaccessing after Lock
description: After the screen resets, re-enter the 4-digit code to access the system.

title: Successful Entry Confirmation
description: Observe confirmation of successful access (e.g., a change in the screen display indicating access granted).
